craftable.name: Spectral Spear of Shojin
craftable.desc: The holder's attacks restore %i:scaleMana% <TFTShadowItemBonus>16 additional Mana.</TFTShadowItemBonus>

craftable.name: Very Dark Blue Buff
craftable.desc:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains %i:scaleMana% 40 Mana.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Zeke's Bleak Herald
craftable.desc: When combat begins, the holder <TFTShadowItemPenalty>reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by %i:scaleAS% 20%.</TFTShadowItemPenalty> <TFTShadowItemBonus>The holder then gains %i:scaleAS% 60% Attack Speed for each affected ally.</TFTShadowItemBonus>

craftable.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate Of Immortality
craftable.desc: The holder heals themself for 70 Health every 2 seconds for each unit targeting them.

craftable.name: Refracted Bramble Vest
craftable.desc: Grants %i:scaleArmor% 500 bonus Armor (including components).

craftable.name: Rabadon's Caustic Deathcap
craftable.desc: Grants %i:scaleAP% <TFTShadowItemBonus>120</TFTShadowItemBonus> bonus Ability Power (including components).

craftable.name: Statikk Stiletto
craftable.desc: <TFTShadowItemBonus>Every other</TFTShadowItemBonus> attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

craftable.name: Sacrificial Redemption
craftable.desc: The holder radiates an aura to <TFTShadowItemBonus>all allies on the board</TFTShadowItemBonus> except themself, and heals them for <TFTShadowItemPenalty>30%</TFTShadowItemPenalty> of their missing Health every 5 seconds.

craftable.name: Caustic Quicksilver
craftable.desc:
The holder gains immunity to crowd control for the entirety of combat.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Hand of Vengeance
craftable.desc:
At the beginning of combat, the holder gains both of the following:
  • +60 Attack Damage and +60 Ability Power.
  • Attacks and Abilities heal for 60% of damage dealt.

    • These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

craftable.name: Sacrificial Infinity Edge
craftable.desc:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

The holder also gains 50% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Refracted Dragon's Claw
craftable.desc:
Reduces incoming magic damage by 50%.

Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

craftable.name: Final Whisper
craftable.desc:
The holder's attacks and abilities reduce the target's Armor and Magic Resist by 70% for the rest of combat.


[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Archdemon's Staff Of Immortality
craftable.desc: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to 700% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

craftable.name: Sacrificial Gauntlet
craftable.desc:
The holder gains 50% Critical Strike Damage, and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike.

The first time they cast their Ability each combat, they gain an additional 30% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (applies to that Ability cast).

craftable.name: Riskthirster
craftable.desc: Physical damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. <TFTShadowItemBonus>Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 60% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.</TFTShadowItemBonus> <TFTShadowItemPenalty>The holder takes 10% of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat or upon being equipped.</TFTShadowItemPenalty>

craftable.name: Caustic Deathblade
craftable.desc: Contributing to a kill grants the holder %i:scaleAD% <TFTShadowItemBonus>20 Attack Damage</TFTShadowItemBonus> for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

craftable.name: Trickster's Gloves
craftable.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. These are always full shadow items.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]

craftable.name: Rapid Deathcannon
craftable.desc:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains %i:scaleAS% +60% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 1 hex.

The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

craftable.name: Titan's Revenge
craftable.desc: 50% of incoming damage is stored. Every 3 seconds, the holder's next attack unleashes this stored damage as true damage.

craftable.name: Frozen Dark Heart
craftable.desc:
Reduces the Attack Speed of all enemies within 2 hexes by 50%.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Ionic Dark-Spark
craftable.desc: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 40%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of their max Mana.

craftable.name: Eclipse Cape
craftable.desc:
Every 1 second(s), a random enemy within 8 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Runaan's Untamed Hurricane
craftable.desc: The holder's attacks fire bolts at <TFTShadowItemBonus>3 nearby enemies</TFTShadowItemBonus>, dealing <TFTShadowItemPenalty>50% of the holder's Attack Damage.</TFTShadowItemPenalty> These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

craftable.name: Force of Darkness
craftable.desc: The holder's team gains <TFTShadowItemBonus>+2</TFTShadowItemBonus> maximum team size, but <TFTShadowItemPenalty>the player's Little Legend takes +100% damage after losing a battle</TFTShadowItemPenalty>.

craftable.name: Fallen Guardian Angel
craftable.desc:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 100% Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Spectral Giantslayer
craftable.desc: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1100 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 80%.

craftable.name: Unstable Zz'Rot Portal
craftable.desc:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, an Unstable Voidspawn with 500 Health arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals 1000 true damage to enemies within 1 hex(es).

Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 50% effective.

craftable.name: Warmog's Sacrificial Armor
craftable.desc: Grants %i:scaleHealth% <TFTShadowItemBonus>2000 bonus Health</TFTShadowItemBonus> (including components).

craftable.name: Hextech Gunblade Of Immortality
craftable.desc: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the ally with lowest percent Health for <TFTShadowItemBonus>100% of the damage dealt.</TFTShadowItemBonus> <TFTShadowItemPenalty>This heal cannot affect the holder.</TFTShadowItemPenalty>

craftable.name: Banshee's Claw
craftable.desc:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Guinsoo's Sacrificial Rageblade
craftable.desc: Attacks grant <TFTShadowItemBonus>+12%</TFTShadowItemBonus> bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

craftable.name: Mor-evil-lonomicon
craftable.desc:
When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 100% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 25 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - only one per champion]

craftable.name: Infinity Edge
craftable.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10.0% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craftable.name: Protector's Vow
craftable.desc: Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.desc:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also gain 10% Durability for 5 seconds (this does not stack).

Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@

craftable.name: Tactician's Cape
craftable.desc:
Your team gains +1 max team size.

10% chance to drop 1 gold after 10 seconds of combat.

"...and a bit of Luck."

craftable.name: Thief's Gloves
craftable.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craftable.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
craftable.desc: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

craftable.name: Ionic Spark
craftable.desc:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of the Mana spent.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craftable.name: Sterak's Gage
craftable.desc: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain 25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

craftable.name: Dragon's Claw
craftable.desc:
Gain 9.0% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 2.5% max Health.

craftable.name: Guardbreaker
craftable.desc: After damaging a Shield, gain 25.0% Damage Amp for 3 seconds.

craftable.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
craftable.desc: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craftable.name: Bramble Vest
craftable.desc:
Gain 5.0% max health.

Take 8.0% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies.

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craftable.name: Giant Slayer
craftable.desc: Gain 25.0% Damage Amp against enemies with more than 1750 max Health.

craftable.name: Sunfire Cape

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craftable.name: Hand Of Justice

Gain 2 effects:
  • 15.0% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
  • 15.0% Omnivamp

    Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

craftable.name: Edge of Night

Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: Titan's Resolve

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craftable.desc: Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

craftable.name: Spear of Shojin
craftable.desc: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Wound: Reduces healing received

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received
